summary: Executing VapourSynth script on Linux, piping the output to FFplay for visualization. No frame-by-frame shift slider available.

details.comment: Executing VapourSynth script on Linux, piping the output to FFplay for visualization. No frame-by-frame shift slider available.
details.content:
vspipe -c y4m basic_test.py - | ffplay -i pipe: 
# working! but no frame by frame shift slider avaliable
